title: Rage And Racial Skill— Reaper's Wrath (Part 7)
body:
Rage And Racial Skill— Reaper's Wrath (Part 7)

Thud!

When Kael's body dropped to the ground, Melad and the other beast people felt as if someone had poured icy cold water over their bodies, and all of them started to shake.

Evan didn't care about their terrified faces and fixed his pitch-black eyes on Melad, the mid-level Rank Two Core Evolver. Sensing Evan's gaze on him, Melad's face turned pale.

"Pl—please forgi_"

Boom!

Before he could finish speaking, his head also exploded like Kael's.

The duration of the Death Guardian Authority was about to end, so Evan didn't care about what Melad was saying and simply sent him off.

Cedar watched as Evan killed Kael and Melad as if he were killing some weak chickens, and his heart nearly jumped out of his chest.

He had enough confidence that he could have killed Kael and Melad without much problem if they had fought. However, he was absolutely sure that the fight wouldn't have been this one-sided.
